tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Lord Of War Trailer HD
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis:
In Theaters: 14 October 2005 (UK)
This film charts the rise and fall of Yuri Orlov, from his early days in the early 1980s in Little Odessa, selling guns to mobsters in his local neighbourhood, through to his ascension through the decade of excess and indulgence into the early 90s, where he forms a business partnership with an African warlord and his psychotic son. The film also charts his relationship through the years with his younger brother, his marriage to a famous model, his relentless pursuit by a determined federal agent and his inner demons that sway between his drive for success and the immorality of what he does.
Genre:Action/War Director:Andrew Niccol Cast:Nicolas Cage, Bridget Moynahan, Jared Leto

tva:Genre.tva:Name: FICTION/DRAMA

tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: This﻿ was hands down Nicolas Cages best performance
is this a good movie﻿
Awesome movie- everyone should watch it IMHO.﻿
looks interesting but really really dumb with all the gangsters﻿ and rich bullshit. I guess modern movies just suck
the trailer﻿ is shit, the movie is 100 times so much better!
Edwin Starr﻿ - War
Rush﻿ Hour Theme Song!
this is my favorite﻿ movie
Amazing movie﻿
whats the﻿ name of the song?
THANK YOU. i was about to comment﻿ that. the trailer's NOTHING like the movie...
This is﻿ one of the best movies I've seen
War﻿
is that the﻿ U DONTSAY guy?
I've watched the trailer multiple times, and the movie﻿ once. Time to watch it again.
she finds out at the endish﻿
Definitely one of my favourite movies﻿ of all time. You can't miss it!
it has nothing to do with gangsters and rich bullshit. go﻿ watch it bevore judging!
This﻿ was a great movie and i like it even more when it is real
Nicolas'﻿ best movie, period.
wish﻿ Russia has feeling
this is my favorite﻿ movie
This is a great movie. It shows that when someone puts﻿ his mind to being something. Then he can always reach his goals!!
From what I'm reading the trailer is nothing compared to the movie and well the﻿ trailer looked pretty awesome to me:)
i hope﻿ you are trolling.

Reviewer.Music: The Sisters Of Mercy, Fields Of The Nephilim, The Cure, X-mal Deutschland, Ghost Dance and so many more.^^

Reviewer.School: We watch hypnotized, addicted to lies.

Reviewer.Music: I like all kind of music.

Reviewer.Books: All Sherlock Holmes Adventures, Lord Of The Rings, Harry Potter, Mice And Men, The Da Vinci Code, Angels & Demons, The Lost Symbol, Slave Island, some of Molière, Voltaire, Victor Hugo books and some of J.J.Tolken books.
Reviewer.Movies:
Films : Lord of The Rings Trilogy, Harry Potter, The Matrix, Avatar, Iron Man, 2012, The Day After Tomorrow, I am Legend, I Robot, Hitch, The Brave Heart, Taken, The Day The Earth Stood Still, Constantine, The Lake House, Meet The Parents, Armageddon, Zohan, 16 Blocks, The Hostage, Die Hard movies, Rocky movies, Ocean's 11;12;13, 300, Legion, 21, What Happens In Vegas, X-men Origins : Wolverine, Vantage Point, The Da Vinci Code, Angels & Demons, 17 again, The Number 23, Batman Begins, The Dark Knight, 007 Casino Royale, 007 Quantum Of Solace, Scary Movie, Shrek, Nemo, Shark Tale, Knocked Up, The Hangover, The Punisher 1 and 2; and A LOT more...
Shows : Heroes, Lost, Dexter, Misfit (bad story but funny as hell), Who's Line Is It Anyway...? etc...
Reviewer.Music: Metallica, U2, Linkin Park, Evanescence, Chris Cornell, Aerosmith, The Beatles, The Who, Sex Pistols, Guns'n'Roses, Nickelback, Eric Clapton, Eagles, Led Zeppelin, Iron Maiden, Greenday, Kiss, Queen, Oasis, Muse, Nirvana, Pink, OneRepublic, PanicAtTheDisco, Pink Floyd, Red Hot Chilli Peppers, Simple Plan, Smash Mouth, Taylor Swift, Avril Lavigne, 30STM, Theory Of A Deadman, 3 Doors Down, Shakira, Britney Spears, Lady GaGa, Madonna, Timbaland, Justin Timberlake, Village People, The White Stripes, Spice Girls, Robbie Williams, Ricky Martin, Louis Amstrong, Cross, Jet, The Gossip, Enrique Iglesias, 50 Cent., Eminem, Elvis Presley, Diddy, Deep Purple, David Guetta, Akon, Crossfade, Coldplay, Christina Aguilera, Boney M., Bon Jovi, Blur, Black Sabbath, Black Eyed Peas, Amr Diab
